summary: This module implements a load‑testing harness for the Litellm Router, generating many concurrent completion requests (including OpenAI style calls) to evaluate the router's queuing behavior, latency, and error handling under stress.
business_intent: To benchmark and validate the scalability, performance, and reliability of the Litellm routing layer when handling high‑volume LLM requests, ensuring proper queuing and resource management in production environments.
